channel.title: Best Source Ever 317 :)
channel.description:
No Pics Sorry.
Client Link: Use Any Client (I Prefer Delta Or Paradise) Source Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?rf2zgnmymmt
Source was not made bye mean so don't flame. I made some major modifications to it that made it 50% better. Player cape is 1000 With No Lag And No dupes And No sypker And No Nulls And Much Much More. Thanks :)
Credits 80% To Jesse 20% To Me.
All the new Runescape weapons & armour - Dragon claws(Special Attack 100%) - PvP Items(Zuriels, Statius, Vestas, ect.) - Dark Bow Fully Coded - Spirit Shields Added
Flawless Combat System - D scimitar Spec 100% - Items Kept On Death Menu(Button Found In Equipment Tab) - Npc Combat Fully Coded 100% - Perfect combat system - Balanced combat triangle - Combat following ( Attack, Range, Mage) - Maging from a distance works - Ranging from a distance works - Ranging distance is 100% accurate - Arrows will follow the player if they are moving - Cannot move if frozen(Or if stunned by the 100% coded DSpear Spec) - Lunar Magic Coded - Cannot glitch or attack with melee from a distance if frozen - Emptying Potions Works, Potion Combining Works. - True 317 Feel But Better. - 10 Second timer added when leaving PvP areas while in combat - Clan wars (Safe Portal & Dangerous Portal) - Wilderness levels(working 100%) - Items dropped upon death 100% - Multi areas added. - Multi-combat works 100% - Skulled when you are the first attacker
Non Player Characters(NPCs) - 1v1 PvN Combat 100% Coded - Some NPC drops unspawnable in order to strengthen economy - King Black Dragon With Real Runescape Look - Corporeal Beast With Real Runescape Look - Dagannoth Mother(Get Their Bye Using The Tele) - Dagannoth Kings(Get Their Bye Using The Tele)
Trading - No trade duping(There never was, just thought I’d say) - Trade screen will not get stuck. - Items will never be lost in trade - No trade limit(You could have guessed...)
Xlogging - If you disconnect while in combat you will die upon login and the correct person will receive the drop.
Item Duplication - All dupes have been found and fixed 100% - Since there’s no dupes we have a strong stable economy
Mini Games -Barrows Mini Game -Tzharr fight pits -7 wave jad Mini Game -Pest Control revamped coming soon -Assault minigame
Skilling Features And Other Features -All Skills work -Slayer updated with player-monster task precision. -Website highscores to compete against friends -Every NPC talks (with up to 10 random dialogues) -Home is Edgeville -Relatively fast training (600xp/hit)

item.title: Best Source Ever 317 :)
item.dc:creator: @SkorgeScape SkorgeScape
item.description:
@SkorgeScape wrote:

No Pics Sorry.

Client Link: Use Any Client (I Prefer Delta Or Paradise)
Source Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?rf2zgnmymmt

Source was not made bye mean so don’t flame. I made some major modifications to it that made it 50% better. Player cape is 1000 With No Lag And No dupes And No sypker And No Nulls And Much Much More. Thanks

Credits 80% To Jesse 20% To Me.

All the new Runescape weapons & armour

  • Dragon claws(Special Attack 100%)
  • PvP Items(Zuriels, Statius, Vestas, ect.)
  • Dark Bow Fully Coded
  • Spirit Shields Added

Flawless Combat System

  • D scimitar Spec 100%
  • Items Kept On Death Menu(Button Found In Equipment Tab)
  • Npc Combat Fully Coded 100%
  • Perfect combat system
  • Balanced combat triangle
  • Combat following ( Attack, Range, Mage)
  • Maging from a distance works
  • Ranging from a distance works
  • Ranging distance is 100% accurate
  • Arrows will follow the player if they are moving
  • Cannot move if frozen(Or if stunned by the 100% coded DSpear Spec)
  • Lunar Magic Coded
  • Cannot glitch or attack with melee from a distance if frozen
  • Emptying Potions Works, Potion Combining Works.
  • True 317 Feel But Better.
  • 10 Second timer added when leaving PvP areas while in combat
  • Clan wars (Safe Portal & Dangerous Portal)
  • Wilderness levels(working 100%)
  • Items dropped upon death 100%
  • Multi areas added.
  • Multi-combat works 100%
  • Skulled when you are the first attacker

Non Player Characters(NPCs)

  • 1v1 PvN Combat 100% Coded
  • Some NPC drops unspawnable in order to strengthen economy
  • King Black Dragon With Real Runescape Look
  • Corporeal Beast With Real Runescape Look
  • Dagannoth Mother(Get Their Bye Using The Tele)
  • Dagannoth Kings(Get Their Bye Using The Tele)

Trading

  • No trade duping(There never was, just thought I’d say)
  • Trade screen will not get stuck.
  • Items will never be lost in trade
  • No trade limit(You could have guessed…)

Xlogging

  • If you disconnect while in combat you will die upon login and the correct person will receive the drop.

Item Duplication

  • All dupes have been found and fixed 100%
  • Since there’s no dupes we have a strong stable economy

Mini Games
-Barrows Mini Game
-Tzharr fight pits
-7 wave jad Mini Game
-Pest Control revamped coming soon
-Assault minigame

Skilling Features And Other Features
-All Skills work
-Slayer updated with player-monster task precision.
-Website highscores to compete against friends
-Every NPC talks (with up to 10 random dialogues)
-Home is Edgeville
-Relatively fast training (600xp/hit)
